_sText: Its a zm_ map with a bunch of places to hide in and a few brakeable things to stop those pesky bastards from getting you while youre running from them. theres a cabin on stilts at the very top, you have to jump up to it to get in. a load of trucks fill one room providing obstacles between you and your stalker and hiding places as well. if youre hiding somewhere, theres almost surely a complicated way to get to you if youre a zombie with a lusting for brain smoothie...
